name: Pair Team
headline: Connecting underserved communities to high quality care
description: Pair Team cares for the highest-need Medicaid recipients through a community-led, virtual care model. We take responsibility for the whole person by addressing not just clinical needs, but also health-related social needs such as housing instability and food access. We partner with local community-based organizations like shelters and safety net providers to coordinate care alongside our multidisciplinary care team to improve the wellbeing of underserved individuals and communities.
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:workflow-automation; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:healthcare-it; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Neil Batlivala, Founder
founders.description:
I am a technical entrepreneur, YC alumni, and co-founder of Pair Team (YC S19). I've spent the majority of my career in healthcare and had the honor of working with some exceptional people while building remote medical teams at Sling, opening primary care practices at Forward, designing medical devices at Spect, training machine learning models at Noxon, and researching pneumonia at UCSF.

50% thrill seeker, 40% dad jokes, 15% math.

founders.name: Cassie Choi, Founder
founders.description: After starting in emergency medicine in Boston, I moved to NYC to work in cardiac critical care at NewYork Presbyterian Columbia University Medical Center. I then moved to San Francisco and worked at Kaiser Permanente and UCSF. After leaving bedside medicine, I was the first RN at Forward building out clinical protocols, workflows and the flagship clinic. After launching Forward, I was director of operations at Circle Medical and launched their flagship clinic before starting Pair Team.

raw_markdown="[![Untitled UI logotext](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/646bf258047a52354b530ffc_pair-team-logo-white.png)](https://pairteam.com/</>)
[About Pair Team](https://pairteam.com/</about>)[For Hospitals](https://pairteam.com/</hospitals>)[For Community Partners](https://pairteam.com/</community-partners>)[Blog](https://pairteam.com/<https:/pair-team.webflow.io/blog>)[Careers](https://pairteam.com/<https:/boards.greenhouse.io/pairteam>)
# We connect underserved communities to high quality care.
Pair Team helps vulnerable patients overcome barriers to medical, mental health, and social services by connecting them to local care teams. We meet patients where they are—in shelters, hospitals, or the community—to ensure they get the right support at no cost.
[How we work](https://pairteam.com/<#howitworks>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/64f3e762bca35ec50e22e3fc_hero-header.png)
Our Partners
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa79514cb570daf42bd709_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.09.41%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa7a83db8385549117cb57_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.09.33%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa7e58fb5d4cd0f4d181fa_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.10.06%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa7bf5189eca76c7ea4bb1_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.09.44%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa7a937d4236bcdb7bf5c0_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.09.38%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67aa7c04ac5a499d48c4cd93_Screenshot%202025-02-10%20at%203.09.52%E2%80%AFPM.png)
How it Works
Our Care Team provides whole-person care as a free service to our patients.
Our in-house medical and care teams bridge the gaps in care by coordinating medical and social services across our trusted partner network. We ensure patients receive seamless, high-quality support—from doctor’s visits to housing, food, and transportation—at no cost to them, their care providers, or hospital partners.
Our Network
We partner with local community organizations to support vulnerable members.
Pair Team forms a committed network of partners in all shapes and sizes, offering technical assistance, training, and sustainable revenue to improve outcomes and wellbeing for our community.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/650388807452d1500450ec3e_prov-pcps.png)
Independent PCPs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6503887f8b1f86f497d06877_prov-large.png)
Large providers and FQHCs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/65038880229ab5bd23e19e21_prov-hospital.png)
EDs, Hospitals, and Health Systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6503887fc284645ab4e7586b_prov-ipa.png)
IPAs and MSOs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6503887f85853dfb8c1c3d2a_prov-counties.png)
Counties and Municipalities
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/65038880e86e4a56bab42bef_prov-shelters.png)
Shelters and Residential Facilities
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6503887fcc02f7772d2b2b86_prov-casemgr.png)
Case Managers and Probation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6503887f623861f6626ad5f8_prov-food.png)
Food Pantries and Drop-In Centers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/650388800b9b95776a3aaaf2_prov-transport.png)
Transportation Providers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/65038880f145b2e7459fe77d_prov-support.png)
Other Social Support Services
### For Hospitals 
### Provide care beyond the hospital for your most vulnerable patients.
We offer post-discharge support, care coordination, and behavioral health resources for your most complex patients. This is all funded by the Enhanced Care Management (ECM) benefit of Medi-Cal, meaning there’s no cost to your hospital.
We help reduce avoidable readmissions, improve quality scores for high-risk patients, and lighten the workload for your hospital staff, ensuring a smoother transition of care and better long-term outcomes.
[Become a hospital partner](https://pairteam.com/</hospitals>)
### For Community Based Organizations
### Partner with us to meet your client’s medical and social needs. 
We offer free, wrap-around care for your clients in need of extra support. Each of our patients has access to a Care Manager and a variety of resources, such as virtual urgent care, free grocery delivery, housing navigation, and more. 
Get compensated for the services you already offer. Pair Team compensates our Community Partners for the role they play in our patients' care. 
[Discover the benefits of our network](https://pairteam.com/</community-partners>)
### Health Plans
### We partner with plans to build community networks that engage hard-to-reach members to address their social and clinical care gaps. More than 90% of the members we serve have not seen their PCP.
[Contact us to learn more](https://pairteam.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1h6iMfTnrS1KWBGI76SptEgdisul>)
Pair Team in the News
[See all Press](https://pairteam.com/</press>)
January 16, 2025
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/6532031cba7596c72187743e_Cision_PRN_Teal.png)
### Pair Team Transitions to Public Benefit Corporation to Expand Its Community Care Hub and High Needs Care Model
PR Newswire
[Read More](https://pairteam.com/<https:/www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/pair-team-transitions-to-public-benefit-corporation-to-expand-its-community-care-hub-and-high-needs-care-model-302352473.html?tc=eml_cleartime>)
August 28, 2023
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/650e00680d7200c4942b9493_press-logo-healthcareit.png)
### Upcoming Healthcare Regulations and Their Impact on Healthcare IT
Healthcare IT Today
[Read Article](https://pairteam.com/<https:/www.healthcareittoday.com/2023/08/28/upcoming-healthcare-regulations-and-their-impact-on-healthcare-it/>)
August 17, 2023
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/650e02234f7d32dca3b2b141_press-logo-forbes.png)
### For Pair Team, Accessibility Is About Delivering Healthcare To Those Who Need It The Most
Forbes
[Read Article](https://pairteam.com/<https:/streaklinks.com/BoC7cKKoaE6VcHOVAgE5xHcD/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Fstevenaquino%2F2023%2F08%2F17%2Ffor-pair-team-accessibility-is-about-delivering-healthcare-to-those-who-need-it-the-most%2F%3Fsh%3D4d4189d2b077?email=rosina%40bamtheagency.com>)
For media inquires, please contact press@pairteam.com
Our philosophy of care
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67af70f0e1dabe6d87a69ecc_noun-trust-7067914-07474D.png)
### Built on Trust
We believe that the foundation of effective healthcare lies in building and nurturing trust. Our patients can always count on us to be transparent, genuine, and compassionate in every interaction, ensuring they feel heard, valued, and respected.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67af71006cfcd8ba8e93b9cb_noun-community-6969825-07474D.png)
### Whole-Person Care
Beyond addressing specific health concerns, we focus on the entire well-being of our patients. Recognizing that physical, mental, emotional, and social factors are interconnected, our holistic approach ensures that every facet of a patient's health is given attention.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/646bc2ff8f75f7372e784626/67af710e5ea7636eeafe93c6_noun-community-6533987-07474D.png)
### Community Collaboration
Healthcare isn't a one-size-fits-all solution. That's why we co-design our partnerships with community organizations to better engage patients in their care plans. By tapping into local insights and listening, we ensure that care is tailored, relevant, and truly effective.
## Our Outcomes
Our care model is designed from best practices and leading care delivery organizations. Through our Community Health Platform, we are scaling our impact nationally.
100k+
lives under management
52%
reduction in emergency room visits
88%
of Pair Team patients re-established with primary care (who were previously unengaged)
Improving outcomes and changing lives.
### I prayed for people to keep me accountable. Mental health, physical health, all have been improving. I’m winning as a person, I learned how to cope and find routine that fits. I didn’t have a job when I started this, now I have a job. You’re one of the people who [helped me]. This changed my life for the better.
### “
### With the help from you and your team, I was able to regain: my smile, my personality, and my self confidence.
### “
### You have built up my self esteem and cared about me. I am totally grateful as you have helped so much. You guys are my guardian angels. It is hard for me to ask for help.
### “
### Doing everything alone, working, providing for my daughter is really hard. I want and know I need a checkup, etc. I want to do everything but I just need that push. Nice to know someone's working with me to get through it all.
### “
### Before, I felt like I was screaming and no one was hearing me. God brought you into my life.
### “
### I'm so very thankful for you and I’m glad your team is here to help people like us navigate the system. I’ve worked in agriculture for 20 years and it has destroyed my body. In the five clinics I’ve gone to since I’ve been here, no one has taken the time to explain the disability system so I can focus on healing.
### “

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pair Team**

**Website:** [pairteam.com](https://pairteam.com)

**Founded:** 2019, part of Y Combinator Batch S19, based in San Francisco.

**Mission:** Pair Team is dedicated to connecting underserved communities to high-quality healthcare. They focus particularly on high-need Medicaid recipients, addressing both clinical and health-related social needs, like housing and food access. 

### Approach to Care:
Pair Team employs a community-led, virtual care model that meets patients where they are—whether that's in shelters, hospitals, or other community settings. They partner with local organizations, such as shelters and safety-net providers, to deliver a holistic, integrated approach to healthcare. Their care isn't just about treating illnesses; it's about improving overall well-being.

### Key Features:
- **Whole-Person Care:** They provide comprehensive services that include access to medical, mental health, and social services—all at no cost to the patients.
- **Partnership Network:** They collaborate with a diverse range of community-based organizations and healthcare providers to ensure patients receive the support they need.
- **No Cost Model:** Care is funded through initiatives like the Enhanced Care Management (ECM) benefit of Medi-Cal, meaning hospitals and patients don't incur any costs.

### Outcomes:
The impact of their approach is significant:
- They manage over 100,000 lives, reducing emergency room visits by 52%.
- 88% of previously unengaged patients are now reconnected to primary care services.

### Team and Culture:
With a team of 78 dedicated employees led by notable partner Nan, Pair Team cultivates a culture grounded in trust and community collaboration. They recognize that effective healthcare solutions must be tailored to the specific needs of the community, and they constantly seek feedback to refine their strategies.

### Challenges and Innovations:
Pair Team acknowledges the complexity of reaching vulnerable populations, particularly since many of their members have not seen a primary care physician (PCP). To combat this, they actively engage with local organizations to streamline access to care while also providing training and resources for better community engagement.

### In the News:
Pair Team has made headlines for its transition to a Public Benefit Corporation, which aims to bolster its community care hub and enhance its model for high-needs care. They have been recognized in various publications for their effective measures in delivering healthcare to those who need it most, emphasizing the importance of accessibility.

### Conclusion:
Pair Team is reshaping healthcare delivery for underserved populations through innovative, community-driven solutions. By integrating medical care with essential social services, they are not just treating patients; they are transforming lives, one community at a time. 

If you're curious about their journey or want to get involved, their [website](https://pairteam.com) offers extensive resources and opportunities for collaboration.
